values: 账单；账款；议案；法案；钞票；纸钞；纸币；招贴；广告；传单；海报；票据；汇票；凭单；单据；清单；（音乐会或演出等的）节目单；鸟嘴；喙；帽舌；（Bill）比尔（人名）
要求…付款；给…开账单；给…送账单；把…宣传为；为…做广告；宣布；把招贴贴于

synonym.mean: 法案；广告；帐单；票据；钞票；清单
宣布；开帐单；用海报宣传

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 广告；记帐；开发票；演员表；总账款

word_group.brief_definition: 卿卿我我, 情话绵绵
建筑工程量表；工程价格核算
商业汇票；商业票据；商业期票
动产所有权转让契据；动产抵押据
无疫健康证明书；完好证明书

bilingual.source: You are asking for the bill in a restaurant.
I paid the bill with a check.

list.abstract: BILL（英 [bɪl]，美 [bɪl]），英文单词，作名词为账单、账款、议案等。作动词为给…开账单、要求…支付、把…列入节目单等。短语搭配有pay the bill（支付票据）。例句有He paid the water bill last month.（他上个月付了水费）。 BILL作名词的近义词有advertisement、note、publicity等；作及物动词的近义词有declare on、to announce。
wtybill，斗鱼tv 炉石传说游戏主播。现居纽约。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, this is not a bill. Now, that's a first.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哦，这个不是账单，还真是头一回啊。

yingyinNormal.en: Dear Mr. Pig, please pay your telephone bill. Oh. What's a bill? It sounds very boring. Bills are very boring.
yingyinNormal.zh: 亲爱的猪先生，请你支付你的电话账单。噢天啊！什么是账单啊？它听上去非常的无聊。账单确实是非常的无聊。

yingyinNormal.en: Actually, we're not. And perhaps you could express a little more concern over the fact that you stole and destroyed a $19 million vehicle. Bill me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 其实，我们不是。而且，你应该稍微关心一下你们偷窃并且毁掉一架价值一千九百万飞机的事实！账单寄给我！

yingyinNormal.en: No way. Not Bill Murray.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不可能，比尔[主演]高大的形像不能毁。

yingyinNormal.en: Get me Bill Gates on the phone.
yingyinNormal.zh: 给我接通比尔 盖茨的电话

yingyinNormal.en: How do we pull back on the bill?
yingyinNormal.zh: 怎样才能撤回法案？

yingyinNormal.en: Paid your phone bill? Not so much.
yingyinNormal.zh: 电话费有交吗？没有。

yingyinNormal.en: Certainly cuts back on the Botox bill.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这肯定影响了肉毒杆菌的销量。

yingyinNormal.en: Let me make this perfectly clear, Bill.
yingyinNormal.zh: 让我非常直白地说吧，比尔

yingyinNormal.en: No, I mean, I just can't support this bill.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，我，我没法支持这项法案。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I have one answer for that: Pass a bill.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我对此只有一个回答:通过一个移民法案。

yingyinNormal.en: You said I wouldn't have to support this bill.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你说我不必支持这个法案的。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, where are you going? To pay my cable bill.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你要去哪？去付我的有线电视费。

yingyinNormal.en: But by the time this bill gets onto the floor...
yingyinNormal.zh: 但等法案进行表决的时候……

yingyinNormal.en: Do you understand me? Bill, do you understand me?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你明白了吗？比尔，你明白我的意思没？

yingyinNormal.en: Is this him? That's Bill Clinton. Who's he hugging?
yingyinNormal.zh: 是他吗？那是比尔克林顿（前总统）。他抱着谁？

yingyinNormal.en: Bill James and mathematics cut straight through that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 比尔詹姆斯的数学理论克服了这些弊端。

yingyinNormal.en: For a lot of people that's less than a cell phone bill or a cable bill.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对大多数人来说这比手机费或者有线电视费要低。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh my God. That's Pete. But why is Bill hugging Pete?
yingyinNormal.zh: 天哪，是彼特，总统为什么抱着彼特？

yingyinNormal.en: What if the gun bill passes in the House, but not the Senate?
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果众议院通过，参议院不通过呢？

exam_freq_info.chinese: 宣传; 海报; 广告

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 广告牌；广告招贴板

word_family.mean: n. 账单；账款；议案；节目单；钞票；招贴；海报；传单；喙；鸟嘴；岬；岬角；钩镰枪；（Bill）警方；警察

sense_info_list.en: a formal statement of a planned new law that is discussed before being voted on

examination_example.sentence: If the <highlight>bills</highlight> become law, state boards and commissions will be required to set aside 50% of board seats for women by 2022.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果这些法案成为法律，到2022年，各州董事会和委员会将被要求为女性留出50%的董事会席位。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>bills</highlight> are similar to a measure recently adopted in California.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些法案类似于加州最近通过的一项措施。

examination_example.sentence: The emerging consensus around the <highlight>bill</highlight> is a sign that legislators are getting frightened about a politically embarrassing short-term collapse at the USPS.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 围绕议案形成的共识表明，立法者对美国邮政署在政治上令人尴尬的短期崩溃感到惊慌害怕。

examination_example.sentence: A one-hour flight is now <highlight>billed</highlight> as a two-hour flight.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一小时的航班现在按两小时的航班计费。

examination_example.sentence: Energy companies can use AI to help customers reduce their electricity <highlight>bills</highlight>, saving them money while helping the environment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 能源公司可以利用人工智能帮助客户降低电费，在帮助环境的同时为他们省钱。

examination_example.sentence: Worse, the crucial income to feed yourself and your family and pay the <highlight>bills</highlight> has disappeared.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 更糟糕的是，养活自己和家人以及支付账单的关键收入已经消失。

examination_example.sentence: That boy was <highlight>Bill</highlight> Gates, and he hasn't stopped reading yet.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那个男孩就是比尔·盖茨，他还没有停止阅读。

examination_example.sentence: His reports paralleled the cartoons of famed artist <highlight>Bill</highlight> Maulden.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的报道与著名艺术家比尔·莫尔登的漫画相似。

sense_info_list.zh: 宣传; 海报; 广告

sense_info_list.en: an itemized list or a statement of particulars (such as a list of materials or of members of a ship's crew)

word_usage.usage: bill表示“议案”时，为可数名词，但多以单数形式出现。
bill作动词时，常与介词for搭配，bill sb. for sth. 表示“给…开送账单”。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 钞票; 纸币; 支票; 票据

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 广告牌；广告招贴板

word_family.mean: n. 账单；账款；议案；节目单；钞票；招贴；海报；传单；喙；鸟嘴；岬；岬角；钩镰枪；（Bill）警方；警察

sense_info_list.en: a formal statement of a planned new law that is discussed before being voted on

examination_example.sentence: A hundred years before iconic figures like <highlight>Bill</highlight> Gates and Steve Jobs permeated our lives, an Irish­-Italian inventor laid the foundation of the communication explosion.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在像比尔·盖茨和史蒂夫·乔布斯这样的标志性人物渗透到我们的生活中的一百年前，一位爱尔兰意大利混血发明家奠定了通讯爆炸的基础。

sense_info_list.zh: 钞票; 纸币; 支票; 票据

word_usage.usage:
pay the bill或pay one's bill表示支付账单，多指餐厅账单。
示例：I will pay the bill this time.
这次我来买单。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 宣传; 海报; 广告
钞票; 纸币; 支票; 票据

数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 广告牌；广告招贴板

word_family.mean: n. 账单；账款；议案；节目单；钞票；招贴；海报；传单；喙；鸟嘴；岬；岬角；钩镰枪；（Bill）警方；警察

examination_example.sentence: But at the end of the meal, customers don't have to worry about the <highlight>bill</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但在用餐结束时，顾客不必担心账单。

examination_example.sentence: Paying hospital <highlight>bills</highlight> for emergency cases.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 支付急诊住院费用。

sense_info_list.en: a formal statement of a planned new law that is discussed before being voted on

examination_example.sentence: California legislators passed a <highlight>bill</highlight> last year that will bring ethnic studies to all its public high schools.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 加州立法者去年通过了一项法案，将把种族研究引入所有公立高中。

examination_example.sentence: "We can't let happen," says Senator Mike Kowall, the lead sponsor of four <highlight>bills</highlight> recently introduced.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 参议员 Mike Kowall 说：“我们不会让此事发生，”他是最近提出的四项法案的主要发起人。

examination_example.sentence: If all four <highlight>bills</highlight> pass as written, they would represent a substantial update of Michigan's 2013 law that allowed the testing of self-driving vehicles in limited conditions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果这四项法案都能以书面形式通过，这就表示密西根在2013年制定的无人驾驶测试制度会发生实质性更新。

sense_info_list.en: an itemized list or a statement of particulars (such as a list of materials or of members of a ship's crew)

sense_info_list.zh: 宣传; 海报; 广告
钞票; 纸币; 支票; 票据

examination_example.sentence: He found an old gold coin, some $100 <highlight>bills</highlight> and a silver wedding ring while replacing the deck.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他在更换甲板时发现了一枚旧金币，一些100美元的钞票和一枚银结婚戒指。

word_usage.usage:
pay the bill或pay one's bill表示支付账单，多指餐厅账单。
示例：I will pay the bill this time.
这次我来买单。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Why does <highlight>Bill</highlight> look troubled?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为什么比尔看起来很烦恼？

examination_example.sentence: What does the woman seem to suggest <highlight>Bill</highlight> do?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这位女士似乎建议比尔做什么？

examination_example.sentence: What does <highlight>Bill</highlight> hope to do about his family?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 比尔希望为他的家庭做些什么？

examination_example.sentence: He paid the water <highlight>bill</highlight> last month.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他上个月付了水费。

examination_example.sentence: You have to organize the activities of the children and take care of the <highlight>bills</highlight> and groceries.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你必须组织孩子们的活动，并照管账单和杂货。

examination_example.sentence: In 1819, John realized that he didn't have enough money to pay his <highlight>bills</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 1819年，约翰意识到他没有足够的钱来支付账单。

examination_example.sentence: She decided to go back to the store and give the cashier (收银员) a five-dollar <highlight>bill</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她决定回到商店，给收银员一张五美元的钞票。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: How long will <highlight>Bill</highlight> stay in Guizhou?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 比尔将在贵州呆多久？

examination_example.sentence: I hadn't heard <highlight>Bill</highlight> talk much about his father.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我没怎么听比尔谈起过他的父亲。

examination_example.sentence: Just like human teachers, <highlight>Bill</highlight> is able to immediately respond to the students' questions and opinions about the topic.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就像人类教师一样，比尔能够立即回应学生关于这个话题的问题和意见。

examination_example.sentence: Today we can do everything with apps: pay <highlight>bills</highlight>, order food and shop for anything.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 今天，我们可以用应用程序做任何事情:支付账单、点餐和购物。

examination_example.sentence: We cannot sign a <highlight>bill</highlight> or write a letter or buy a house without our pen.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 没有笔，我们不能签单、写信或买房。

examination_example.sentence: How much was Sunny's <highlight>bill</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: Sunny的账单是多少？

examination_example.sentence: The old man took out a 10-yuan <highlight>bill</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 老人拿出一张10元的钞票。

word_usage.usage:
pay the bill或pay one's bill表示支付账单，多指餐厅账单。
示例：I will pay the bill this time.
这次我来买单。
